function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased utilization of urban green spaces during the pandemic","Impact":"Risk of contagious disease spread due to crowded green spaces","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures and capacity limits for green spaces","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring and management technology","People":"Visitors to urban green spaces","Owner":"Local authorities and park management"},{"Description":"Traveling long distances to access attractive green spaces","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases across different areas","Mitigation":"Promote use of local green spaces and limit long-distance travel","Technologies":"Location-based mobile apps for finding nearby green spaces","People":"Travelers and tourists","Owner":"Tourism authorities and local governments"},{"Description":"Public perception shift towards the importance of urban green spaces","Impact":"Increased pressure on urban green spaces and potential overcrowding","Mitigation":"Develop and expand urban green spaces to accommodate increased demand","Technologies":"Green infrastructure planning software and urban design tools","People":"Residents and visitors to urban areas","Owner":"Urban planning and development authorities"}]}
